00035 namespace sys
00036 {
00037     
00044     class ReadWriteMutex
00045     {
00046     public:
00048         ReadWriteMutex(int maxReaders) : mSem(maxReaders)
00049         {
00050             mMaxReaders = maxReaders;
00051             dbg_printf("Creating a read/write mutex\n");
00052         }
00053         
00055         virtual ~ReadWriteMutex() 
00056         {
00057             dbg_printf("Destroying a read/write mutex\n");
00058         }
00059 
00064         virtual bool lockRead();
00065         
00070         virtual bool unlockRead();
00071 
00075         virtual void lockWrite();
00076 
00080         virtual void unlockWrite();
00081 
00082     protected:
00083         sys::Semaphore mSem;
00084         sys::Mutex mMutex;
00085         int mMaxReaders;
00086     };
